scripts.publish.select: ng build --configuration production is-select && npm publish ./dist/is-select
scripts.publish.select-tree: ng build --configuration production is-select-tree && npm publish ./dist/is-select-tree
scripts.publish.dx-select-tree: ng build --configuration production is-dx-select-tree && npm publish ./dist/is-dx-select-tree
scripts.publish.input-mapping: ng build --configuration production is-input-mapping && npm publish ./dist/is-input-mapping
scripts.publish.codemirror: ng build --configuration production is-codemirror && npm publish ./dist/is-codemirror
scripts.publish.froala: ng build --configuration production is-froala && npm publish ./dist/is-froala
scripts.publish.core-ui: ng build --configuration production is-core-ui && node copy-styles.js && npm publish ./dist/is-core-ui
scripts.publish.datepicker: ng build --configuration production is-datepicker && npm publish ./dist/is-datepicker
scripts.publish.bootstrap-switch: ng build --configuration production is-bootstrap-switch && npm publish ./dist/is-bootstrap-switch
scripts.publish.modal: ng build --configuration production is-modal && npm publish ./dist/is-modal
scripts.publish.grid: ng build --configuration production is-grid && npm publish ./dist/is-grid
scripts.publish.table: ng build --configuration production is-table && npm publish ./dist/is-table
scripts.publish.timepicker: ng build --configuration production is-timepicker && npm publish ./dist/is-timepicker
scripts.publish.cron: ng build --configuration production is-cron-editor && npm publish ./dist/is-cron-editor
scripts.publish.editable-textbox: ng build --configuration production is-editable-textbox && npm publish ./dist/is-editable-textbox
scripts.publish.checkmap: ng build --configuration production is-checkmap && npm publish ./dist/is-checkmap
scripts.publish.cdk: ng build --configuration production is-cdk && npm publish ./dist/is-cdk
